summary: Discussion about Kimi-Linear vision model, token-color semantics, attention as memory, and building an LLM memory architecture for the neuro project.

highlights.title: Color-coded tokens
highlights.detail: Tokens are imagined as colored lights; each color encodes a modality or emotional tone.

highlights.title: Attention as storage
highlights.detail: Attention beams trace paths across the network, leaving trails that act as episodic memory.

highlights.title: Memory architecture
highlights.detail: Designing memory/ as the internal mind of the project, while SMM/ and src/ remain the physical body.
